But I was actually in a deep depression and I would just smoke to distract myself. If thatâ€™s the case, then maybe take a step back. Also, I would try asking him to not smoke until *after* you hang out, or at least not right before. Relationships come down to sacrificeâ€“ from both sides. Try meeting in the middle :)
